Reviews.Content: hotel nastiest hotel smelled musty urine left clothes damp unpacked clothes home spilt mildewed water suitcase ants bugs crumbs floor stains comforter left bite marks bugs hotel employees told day ants spray day send rusty fishing hooks held set curtains lucky didnt stuck miracle thats def safety hazard esp kids internet unless pay 10 day eventhough book tell includes internet please money elsewhere wish wouldve read reviews booked vacation oh mess reservation hassle getting resolved ruined trip

Reviews.Title: “Completely appauled, disguisted, and both bitten all over! Worst hotel experience EVER!!”
Reviews.Author: pineappleprinsez
Reviews.Content: worst booking staying experience called website questions told internet pool mini fridge microwave conformation hotel 2 weeks frustrating issues fix issue understood happened crossed hotel finally english person fix issue money wasnt refunded wrong refundable wrong told refundable booking im contacting business bureau im reserved parrot lagoon stayed 10 disguisting odor damp bugs mini fridge sharp fish hooks curtains air conditioner sounded landing crash ants told 12 hr checking theyd spray ants worse day explain theyre shower bathroom clothes bags food walls night walked didnt concerned ill bit spray hours towels rough bad odor musty odor smelled peed clothes smelled damp suitcase coming home smell odor hair bags sick smell stayed couldnt sleep bed knowing comforter stains itchy bitten 2nd night couldnt sleep comfortably beds kept seeing bugs woke hour worry time feeling crawling bite jaw cant pics bites heres disguisting freaked ill recoomend scared life plus walls paper thin couldnt sleep hearing door floor shake whe people walk outside hotel please dont worth fewer dollars

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay for cheap”
Reviews.Author: tonilovesyoux3
Reviews.Content: booked extremely 2 double beds ocean lodge parrot lagoon motel indeed sleep shower 3 friends stayed saturday monday 138 roomplus 152 40 person clean bathroom maid service towels dirty ones chilled couple times watched tv eating pizza bad bathroom tinier expected door didnt lock boyfriend friend wasnt weird happened walk lol pretty quiet except traffic outside didnt hear rowdy seniors beach week beach 2 blocks staff nice parking door definitely recommend

Reviews.Title: “It's sure worth it!”
Reviews.Author: aimeelovesoc
Reviews.Content: weather memorial day weekend perfect getaway dad planned started trip beat traffic friday morning half tire blew tell start weekend ride finally oc greeted smiley nice surprise stayed satisfied impressed changes clean nice housekeeper kept stocked weekend fresh towels spent portion time outdoor pool am definitely summer thank weekend parrot lagoon staff
